Now there is a critical choice for black. He has two options Kd6 and Ke5.

20. ... Kd6 21. Nf4  Kf6 22. Nh5  Ke5 (22. ... Kd6 Ng7 ) 23. Qf4  Kd6 
24. Qg4  Ke5 ( 24. ... f5 Qxg6 here white will be up a pawn. And because the king is exposed white will be better. But still black can resist.) 25. f4  Kxe4 26. Qf3  Kd4 27. O-O-O and mate will be followed.

20. ... Ke5 21. Qf4  Kd6 (21. ... Kd4 22. O-O-O  Kc5 23. Qe4 and white will soon mate the black king) 22. Qg4  and it will turn into the same variation I told with Kd6.
